definition: talking in one's sleep/delirious ravings/nonsense/sheer fantasy
dream/CL:場|场[chang2],個|个[ge4]/(bound form) to dream

sentences.english: But stop and loiter all the time, to sing it in extatic songs.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾懶了遊蕩而已，哼着歌曲說說夢囈。

sentences.english: In view of this, cyclical stocks in 2008 is balderdash .
sentences.chinese: 由此看來，週期性股票的確是2008年的夢囈。

sentences.english: The drug clonazepam improves sleep and reduces dream-enactment behaviors.
sentences.chinese: 藥物安定可以提高睡眠質量以及減少夢囈的發生。

sentences.english: Speaking of her love, has become a romantic balderdash.
sentences.chinese: 愛對她來講，已經成爲一種浪漫的夢囈。

definition: tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
(of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
not a sound to be heard (idiom)
Silkworms in Spring (1933), Chinese silent movie in socialist realist style, based on novel by Mao Dun 茅盾[Mao2 Dun4]
mountain and river exhausted (idiom); at the end of the line/nowhere to go
lit. as round as pearls and as smooth as jade (idiom)/fig. elegant and polished (of singing or writing)
